grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 呪術【ジュジュツ】magic, sorcery, incantation
消災呪【ショウサイジュ】disaster-preventing incantation, disaster-preventing dharani
kun reading compounds: 呪う【まじなう】to pray that one avoids disaster or illness, to pray, to pray for the death or misfortune of another, to curse, to treat illness with prayer
呪い殺す【のろいころす】to curse someone to death, to put a deadly curse on someone
呪い【まじない】charm, incantation, spell, curse
呪う【のろう】to curse, to put a curse on, to detest intensely
